Also known as ''[[Vodafone]] TV'' - [https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/dna-tv-hubi DCTI384] UHD (VF SP NEBA)
The label at the bottom has these references: * Reference No: 253726976 * Part No: 86626 * Hardware version: es - 63
===See also=== :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/oem/sagemcom ''Sagemcom STB''] • [[List of STB devices]] *[[Sagemcom DCTI384]] (UHD) - [[Broadcom]] BCM7252S @1.7GHz (Dual Core) *[[Sagemcom DCTIW384]] (DNA) - [[Broadcom]] BCM7252S @1.7GHz (Dual Core) *[[Sagemcom DTIW384]] (EUS) - [[Broadcom]] BCM7252S @1.7GHz (Dual Core) *[[Sagemcom DCIW384]] (EUS) - [[Broadcom]] BCM7252S @1.7GHz (Dual Core) *[[Sagemcom DCIW387]] (UHD) - [[Broadcom]] BCM7271U @1.7GHz (Quad Core) *[[Sagemcom DIW387]] (UHD) - [[Broadcom]] BCM7271U @1.7GHz (Quad Core) *[[Sagemcom DIW362]] (VDF) - [[Broadcom]] BCM72604 @1.5GHz (Dual Core) *[[Sagemcom DIW362P]] (1U1) - [[Broadcom]] BCM72604 @1.5GHz (Dual Core) *[[Sagemcom DCTIW362]] (PLAY) - [[Broadcom]] BCM72604 @1.5GHz (Dual Core) <!-- Android TV Guide
